page.title: 06EVENTS GILWERN SCHOOL FETE
page.content: Gilwern School Fete is an annual event,which was first held in 1978.There have been about 7 successful Fetes so far. The Fete is held on about the second week of June each year, on a Saturday.The money that is raised at the Fete goes towards the School.It is always held in the School grounds.Every year there are a variety of events to attract and amuse all members of the public.Some of the Fetes have included horse riding,football tournaments,gymnastic displays,trampolining and many other interesting items.Usually there is a fire engine or a double decker bus for the children to go inside.There is always a variety of stalls such as hoopla,teddy bears,goldfish,cans,win a football,etc.Finally,one is guaranteed a plentiful supply of refreshments and a brass band entertains one and all.
